checkCodes

public Status checkCodes(int[] codes,
                         Punch[] punches)
This algorithm is able to compute an exact number of MPs for any course configuration including butterflies, and for any MP event (jumping a control, inverting controls, missing a central control in a loop).

public void normalTrace(RunnerRaceData data)
This is a utility method to build a trace without checking codes, typically because the data comes from an unknown chip without a course.
